info.name: username
info.description: The username for the Kinetic Task instance.

info.name: password
info.description: The password for the Kinetic Task instance.

info.name: kinetic_task_location
info.description: The location of the Kinetic Task instance (ie. http://task.kineticdata.com/kinetic-task).

info.name: signature_key
info.description: The id of the access key to use to sign the request

info.name: signature_secret
info.description: The secret of the access key to use to sign the request

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
